info.name: schedule_test_05
info.description:
Uses 6 dimmable, 1 CCT, 4 PLC, and 2 EnOcean devices to test a variety of absolute schedule items with User created scenes.

Test will add the items then adjust the virtual time to check that all bundles of items are triggered properly.

Also testing Daily, Weekly and onetime events.

exec: tests["Status code is 200"] = responseCode.code === 200;
